articles.title: Jackson water crisis deepens as state deploys National Guard
articles.description: Officials began distributing water for city residents who for days have struggled as the state capital's water facility foundered.

articles.title: Live updates: Trump's special master bid
articles.description: A federal judge held a hearing Thursday to consider former President Donald Trump's request for a special master to oversee the FBI's review of materials seized in the search of his Mar-a-Lago estate. Follow here for live news updates.
